channel.title: 508 help!
channel.description: in palidino76's 508 client do i go into cmd > run to run the server? cuz if u do it says [code]The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] its actually "Teh Codex" client[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2008, 05:07:00 pm[/size][hr]And when i run it - says [code]Error: SignLink:233 SignLink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 client:2194 | java.lang.Runtime Exception [/code]

item.title: 508 help!

item.description:
@public_boolean wrote:

I dont recoommend Palidinos76 client, it has a wierd error in the SignLink, try Grahams Ip changer.

item.title: 508 help!
item.dc:creator: @stickman968 stickman968
item.description:
@stickman968 wrote:

how do i add npc’s and items to palidino76’s 508 client cos i logged on theres no npc’s no items and you cant use the bank booth or anything
help plz…

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help!
item.dc:creator: @thurax thurax
item.description:
@thurax wrote:

you need to download first java developement kit (JDK) and then edit the run.cmd to your jdk version (for example you have jdk jdk1.6.0_12 and in the run.cmd it says jdk1.6.0_06 so you change the 06 to 12) and thats all.

Read full topic
